response_deadline: Reasonable time for public data; 10 days for data subject requests
notes: Two-tier system: 'reasonable time' for public records, 10 business days for personal data requests. Presumption of public access unless specifically classified.

basic_request.subject: Minnesota Government Data Practices Act Request
basic_request.body:
Dear Responsible Authority:

Pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act, Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13, I respectfully request access to inspect and copy the following government data:

[SPECIFIC DESCRIPTION OF RECORDS]

I understand that government data are public unless specifically classified as nonpublic by federal law, state statute, or temporary classification. Please provide the requested data as soon as reasonably possible as required by Minn. Stat. ยง 13.03.

If you are not able to provide copies immediately, please supply them as soon as reasonably possible. If any portion of this request is denied, please provide written explanation citing the specific legal basis for the classification.

I prefer to receive responsive records electronically when reasonably possible to minimize costs. Please provide a fee estimate if copying charges will exceed $10.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
[YOUR NAME]
[YOUR ADDRESS]
[PHONE NUMBER]
[EMAIL ADDRESS]

data_subject_request.subject: Data Subject Request - Personal Information
data_subject_request.body:
Dear Responsible Authority:

Pursuant to Minnesota Statutes Section 13.04, I am requesting access to government data about myself. Please provide copies of all data you maintain about me.

I understand you must comply with this request immediately if possible, or within 10 business days if immediate compliance is not possible, excluding Saturdays, Sundays, and legal holidays.

[PROVIDE IDENTIFICATION INFORMATION AS REQUESTED]

If any data about me is classified as nonpublic, please explain the classification and provide any summary data that may be available.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
[YOUR NAME]
[YOUR ADDRESS]
[PHONE NUMBER]
[EMAIL ADDRESS]
